sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, Search, Edit2, Trash2, X, Calendar, DollarSign, MapPin, FileText, Truck, BarChart2 } from 'lucide-react'; // Sample data for demonstration const initialJobs = [ { id: 1, invoiceNumber: "INV-2025-001", name: "John Smith", address: "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001", description: "Plumbing repair and bathroom renovation", services: "Pipe replacement, Fixture installation", date: "2025-04-08", servicePrice: 850, transport: 75, tax: 92.5, totalPrice: 1017.5 }, { id: 2, invoiceNumber: "INV-2025-002", name: "Emily Johnson", address: "456 Park Ave, Boston, MA 02108", description: "Electrical system upgrade", services: "Panel replacement, Rewiring", date: "2025-04-10", servicePrice: 1200, transport: 50, tax: 125, totalPrice: 1375 }, { id: 3, invoiceNumber: "INV-2025-003", name: "Michael Williams", address: "789 Oak Dr, Chicago, IL 60601", description: "HVAC maintenance", services: "Filter replacement, System cleaning", date: "2025-04-15", servicePrice: 350, transport: 60, tax: 41, totalPrice: 451 } ]; // Generate a new invoice number based on the latest one const generateInvoiceNumber = (jobs) => { if (jobs.length === 0) return "INV-2025-001"; const lastInvoice = jobs.reduce((max, job) => { const current = parseInt(job.invoiceNumber.split('-')[2]); return current > max ? current : max; }, 0); return `INV-2025-${(lastInvoice + 1).toString().padStart(3, '0')}`; }; const Admin = () => { const [jobs, setJobs] = useState(initialJobs); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [editingJob, setEditingJob] = useState(null); const [newJob, setNewJob] = useState({ invoiceNumber: generateInvoiceNumber(jobs), name: "", address: "", description: "", services: "", date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], servicePrice: 0, transport: 0, tax: 0, totalPrice: 0 }); // Filter jobs based on search term const filteredJobs = jobs.filter(job => job.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || job.invoiceNumber.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || job.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); // Handle input changes for new job form const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; const updatedJob = { ...newJob, [name]: value }; // Recalculate tax and total if service price or transport changes if (name === 'servicePrice' || name === 'transport') { const servicePrice = name === 'servicePrice' ? parseFloat(value) || 0 : parseFloat(newJob.servicePrice) || 0; const transport = name === 'transport' ? parseFloat(value) || 0 : parseFloat(newJob.transport) || 0; const tax = (servicePrice * 0.1); // Assuming 10% tax const totalPrice = servicePrice + transport + tax; updatedJob.tax = tax; updatedJob.totalPrice = totalPrice; } setNewJob(updatedJob); }; // Handle job submission const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (editingJob) { // Update existing job setJobs(jobs.map(job => job.id === editingJob.id ? {...newJob, id: job.id} : job)); } else { // Add new job const jobToAdd = { ...newJob, id: jobs.length > 0 ? Math.max(...jobs.map(job => job.id)) + 1 : 1 }; setJobs([...jobs, jobToAdd]); } // Reset form and close modal setIsModalOpen(false); setEditingJob(null); setNewJob({ invoiceNumber: generateInvoiceNumber([...jobs, newJob]), name: "", address: "", description: "", services: "", date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], servicePrice: 0, transport: 0, tax: 0, totalPrice: 0 }); }; // Handle editing job const handleEdit = (job) => { setEditingJob(job); setNewJob({...job}); setIsModalOpen(true); }; // Handle deleting job const handleDelete = (id) => { setJobs(jobs.filter(job => job.id !== id)); }; // Calculate dashboard stats const totalRevenue = jobs.reduce((sum, job) => sum + job.totalPrice, 0); const averageJobValue = jobs.length > 0 ? totalRevenue / jobs.length : 0; const pendingJobs = jobs.filter(job => new Date(job.date) > new Date()).length; return (
{/* Header */}

Service Jobs Dashboard

{/* Stats Overview */}

Total Revenue

${totalRevenue.toFixed(2)}

Average Job Value

${averageJobValue.toFixed(2)}

Pending Jobs

{pendingJobs}

{/* Search and Filter */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Jobs Table */}
{filteredJobs.length > 0 ? ( filteredJobs.map((job) => ( )) ) : ( )}
Invoice # Customer Description Date Price Actions
{job.invoiceNumber}
{job.name}
{job.address.length > 20 ? `${job.address.substring(0, 20)}...` : job.address}
{job.description.length > 30 ? `${job.description.substring(0, 30)}...` : job.description}
{new Date(job.date).toLocaleDateString()}
${job.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
Service: ${job.servicePrice.toFixed(2)}
No jobs found. Try a different search or add a new job.
{/* Modal for Adding/Editing Job */} {isModalOpen && (
setIsModalOpen(false)}>

{editingJob ? ( <> Edit Job #{editingJob.invoiceNumber} ) : ( <> Add New Service Job )}

Pricing Details

Total Price: ${newJob.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
)}
); }; export default Admin;
